title: useEffect for Document Title
instructions:
Create a component that updates the document title based on a counter.

Requirements:
1. Display a counter (starting at 0)
2. Add increment/decrement buttons
3. Use useEffect to update document.title to show the count
4. The title should be 'Count: X' where X is the current count

useEffect runs side effects after render. By specifying dependencies, you control when the effect runs.
